bill.summary:
Sustainable Water Supplies Act
This bill directs the Department of the Interior to enter into cooperative agreements with nonfederal entities to provide water supplies for:
contractors for the Central Valley Project, California; units of the National Wildlife Refuge System; state wildlife areas; and private wetland areas. Interior shall report on the long-term feasibility of these agreements to augment the federal water supply.
